_header: The red man here to his white wife
Note:
Singer (1928)
XSinger, Dorothea Waley. Catalogue of Latin and Vernacular Alchemical Manuscripts. 3 vols. Brussels: Lamertin, 1928-31, 448.
_description: A couplet on a scroll attached to alchemical symbols

BLEge845.Transcription: The red man here to his white wyfeYs maryed with the spryte of Lyfe
BLEge845.Note: Written above full-page line drawing of man and wife in a vial.
BLEge845.Editions:
Singer,  Dorothea Waley. 
             Catalogue of Latin and Vernacular Alchemical Manuscripts.
         3 vols. Brussels: Lamertin, 1928-31: 2.351.
